com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Am3sControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Am3sControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl

    public class Am3sControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl
    Public API for the AM3S

    The class provides methods to control AM3S device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a AM3S device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(long) to discovery a new AM3S device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect AM3S device.

        set user information
        Parameters:

        height - height(int unit is cm)
        weight - weight(float)
        gender - sex:1 male,0 female
        unit - 1 Metric,0 imperial standard
        target - the goal of maximum steps
        activityLevel - 1 Sedentary,2 Active,3 Very active
